type.name: org.gradle.api.publish.ivy.IvyExtraInfoSpec
type.description: * Represents a modifiable form of IvyExtraInfo so that "extra" info elements * can be configured on an Ivy publication.

method.name: add
method.description: * Puts the specified extra element into the list of extra info elements. * * @param namespace The namespace of the element to add * @param name The name of the element to add * @param value The value of the element to add
